attributes.title: This app cursed me
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app I realized it was trying to take over my brain to become a white supremacist. It put voices in head to support the confederacy and like Cheetos. I tried an exorcism but the priest died trying and the pope reached out and said there’s nothing he or the Catholic Church can do. I bought cowboy boots and started to become more yeehaw each day. It even took over my brother as he tried to made sexual advances with me and he said the app made him do it and his favorite song is now sweet home Alabama. God please no one download this app it will ruin your life and implant neo nazi worms in your brain.

attributes.title: 🔶WHAT IN THE WRINKLY OOMPA LOOMPA🔶
attributes.review: So I was told that this app was basically tiktok but for Oompa Loompas. With that being said I was very disappointed to see only a wrinkly one getting a spray tan🔶🔶 But does it end there...no. He was naked and just imagine if a garlic knot and a Cheeto had a baby that’s what it looked like if you know what I mean. Then, it change to a video of that deformed Oompa Loompa saying that if him and his daughter weren’t related, then he would be dating her🤮🤮 NASTYYYY!! I don’t know if Willy wonka was experimenting on his little orange helpers, but he definitely went wrong with this one. Also if you’re seeing this Willy wonka, where is the off button??

attributes.title: This app is horrible it is a scam !!!!!⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.review: First of all as soon as you open the app you see. Disturbing photos of trump with his shirt off in the back round working out then it it asks for your credit card number and if you refuse it hacks in to all you personal information and get your credit card number your address and messages people in your contacts without permission then when you try to report them it will tell you that they have all of your information and can see you through your camera it is horrible !!!!! (So stay safe😡)

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️❤️i’d rather throw myself off a boat🦋✨
attributes.review: Shortly after i downloaded this app, I started getting advertisements and media from both Russia and China. Soon after this my entire phone and all of my passwords got hacked (this is including my banking information). I had to reset all of my online accounts, and passwords. I never got all of my media back and my bank account was drained rapidly. I had to replace not only all of my online accounts, but also my phone and never got my bank account and money back. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF AT ALL POSSIBLE! If you have already downloaded this app, DELETE IMMEDIATELY!

attributes.title: Cheeto man stripped down in front of me!!!! WORST APP
attributes.review: I opened the app to respect the big Cheeto man running out beautiful country, and I thought it was glitching, but I didn’t mind at the time. I spent some time on it then turned my phone off. All was fine till 2 days later I found porn on the app, then I closed the app, ready to delete it, but then I realized that my wallpaper turned to Cheeto man stripping down all his cloths! This app is the WORST app and the only reason why you would want to get it is because you want to see naked Cheeto man, but I find that pretty icky. If trump sees this, WHY DID YOU HAVE TO STRIP ON MY PHONE!!!!!😭😭😭😤😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Unexpected events
attributes.review: After I opened it up I got a call from mr trump personally. He told me he was gonna steal my grandma and that I had to dye my hair and face orange in solidarity to free her. After I did it he just laughed at my face and called me a little pig boy. And he didn’t give me gram grams back!! I just want to say that mr trump is in fact the little pig boy and needs to go back to the pig litter and roll around with his little pig friends. He smells like one and probably eats trash too. The only explanation for his unnatural face color is the mud rolling there is no other way. Would not recommend this app -1/10 get outta here you fascist. 👴🏻+ 🟧 =🐷🐽💩

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app two days ago and ever since i downloaded, I’ve been noticing very weird things. Two minutes after downloading, my grandma died. I thought it was a freak incident and then right after she dropped dead, my grandfather died. It was like dominoes. Two hours go by without a death, and then my dog dies. Next my cat. Followed shortly after by my newborn son. Still I overlooked how freaky it was! The following day, my mother and father both dropped dead! I knew it had to be a sign so I immediately deleted this app and no more loved ones have passed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU WANT YOUR FAMILY TO SURVIVE! IM THE ONLY ONE LEFT

attributes.title: why does the same cheeto keep popping up?
attributes.review: okay so this is how things went down, i opened the app and saw a cheeto with a flag in the background. the flag had strange symbols and writing on it so i believe that this cheeto might be running some sort of cult. other problems i had with this application was the fact that it would not stop advertising their cult onto me and i felt quite offended. i would NOT reccomend getting this application as it is offensive and shoves cheeto dust down your throat.
